PageTitle: display bgp unnumbered peer interface orf ip-prefix
FuncDef: The display bgp unnumbered peer interface orf ip-prefix command displays prefix-based outbound route filter (ORF) information received from BGP unnumbered peers. The display bgp unnumbered peer interface orf ip-prefix command displays prefix-based outbound route filter (ORF) information received from BGP unnumbered peers.
CLIs: display bgp unnumbered peer interface { <interface-name> | <IfType> <IFNum> } orfip-prefix

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an interface name.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 characters.

Specifies the number of an interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp unnumbered peer interface 100GE 1/0/1 orf ip-prefix
ExtraInfo: After the prefix-based ORF capability is successfully negotiated, you can run this command to check prefix-based ORF information received from BGP unnumbered peers.
